tool.name: Sieve Classes
tool.description: The 'Sieve Classes' tool counts the number of adjacent cells sharing the same value (the class identifier). Areas that are formed by less cells than specified by the treshold will be removed (sieved), i.e. they are set to no-data.

param.name: MODE
param.label: Neighbourhood
param.help: Neumann: the four horizontally and vertically neighboured cells; Moore: all eight adjacent cells

param.name: THRESHOLD
param.label: Minimum Threshold
param.help: Minimum number of cells in a group of adjacent cells.
